Attempt to run JUnits with 1.4 JRE produces error:

Caused by: junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: 0.1 org.eclipse.equinox.security.boot.jre15x
	at junit.framework.Assert.fail(Assert.java:47)
	at junit.framework.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:20)
	at junit.framework.Assert.assertNotNull(Assert.java:217)
	at org.eclipse.core.tests.session.ConfigurationSessionTestSuite.getURL(ConfigurationSessionTestSuite.java:136)
	at org.eclipse.core.tests.session.ConfigurationSessionTestSuite.addBundle(ConfigurationSessionTestSuite.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.security.junit.SignedBundleTest.suite(SignedBundleTest.java:99)

Note this line in the SignedBundleTest:

	private static final String BUNDLE_SECURITY_FRAGMENT = "org.eclipse.equinox.security.boot.jre15x"; //$NON-NLS-1$

This fragment is for 1.5 JRE only?
